epitopes 0.5.1

Reference

All functions

calc_features()

Calculate statistical and physicochemical features for peptides

calc_performance()

Calculate epitope classification performance indices

filter_epitopes()

Filter epitopes by taxonomy and host

fit_model()

Fit Random Forest model to epitope data

get_IEDB()

Download and unzip IEDB database (XML export)

get_LBCE()

Extract linear B Cell epitopes from XML files retrieved from IEDB.

get_feature_functions()

Print available feature calculation functions

get_proteins()

Retrieve protein sequences and data from GenBank and Uniprot

get_taxonomy()

Retrieve taxonomic classification tables from NCBI.

label_proteins()

Label protein positions based on epitope data

make_OrgSpec_datasets()

Build organism-specific data sets for training epitope prediction models

make_heterogeneous_dataset()

Build a heterogeneou dataset of predefined size

make_proteins_dataset()

Builds a partially labelled dataset from protein and epitope sequences

make_window_df()

Assemble a sliding window representation of epitope or protein data

prepare_join_df()

Merge and filter epitope and protein data

read_abcpred()

Read saved output from ABCPred

read_bepipred2()

Read saved output from Bepipred2

read_ibceel()

Read saved output from iBCE-EL

read_lbtope()

Read saved output from LBtope

read_svmtrip()

Read saved output from SVMtrip

smooth_predictions()

Smoothing of prediction vectors

split_epitope_data()

Split epitope data based on epitope, protein or organism IDs.
